name: Adventure Medical Kits Mountaineer First Aid Kit
description: Add a mini-ER to your basecamp with this comprehensive first aid kit. The Mountaineer first aid kit has extensive supplies for confidence on multi-week adventures. Designed for 10 people on 28-day adventures, this kit takes care of everything from trauma essentials, to minor allergic reactions. With 6 different compartments: wound care/burn/blister, medication, cuts and scrapes, instruments, fracture/sprain and stop bleeding fast, getting what you need is fast and intuitive. An included compact summit first aid kit lets you pack the bare necessities for day-trips, letting you leave the big kit in camp.Includes a bilingual wilderness first aid guide.Designed for 10 people on 28-day adventures.Compact zippered case has quick-reference guide printed on the back, so you know where to find what you need when you need it.Internal pockets are labeled (wound care/burn/blister, medication, cuts and scrapes, instruments, fracture/sprain and stop bleeding fast) making off-grid care easier and more instinctual.Included summit kit with 2 DryFlex™ bags to pack the essentials, while the larger kit stays at camp.Control severe bleeding with the 10.25cm emergency bandage (aka Israeli Bandage) and trauma pads (12.7 x 22.8cm and 20 x 25cm).Precut moleskin patches help you get back on the trail faster and stop blisters before they start.GlacierGel™ blister & burn dressings relieve pain, reduce scarring and speed up healing time.C-Splint™ (91 x 10.25 cm) helps you stabilize and secure fractures, sprains and dislocations.EMT shears keep your from having you use your pocket knife when it comes time to cut gauze or bandages.20cc irrigation syringe lets you clean wounds before bandaging them.Elasticised bandage helps stabilize strains or sprains.Medicine pouch has room to pack your own assortment of medicines to manage fevers, pain, allergies and stomach aches.Single-use thermometers lets you assess fevers in the field.Reflective mountain logo makes the first aid bag easier to find in low-light.Please note that MEC sells the International version of this kit. Contents may vary slightly from the US versions described on the vendor's website and videos.
